Effect.en: You can target 1 "Unchained" card in your GY, except "Unchained Twins - Salama"; Set it to your field, then destroy 1 card you control. If this card on the field is destroyed by card effect, except "Unchained Twins - Salama", or by battle: You can Special Summon 1 "Unchained" monster from your hand or Deck, except "Unchained Twins - Salama". You can only use each effect of "Unchained Twins - Salama" once per turn.
